title: Association between polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon exposure and cognitive performance in older adults: a cross-sectional study from NHANES 2011â€“2014
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1348-1359
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00290C, Paper
Zerong Guan, Xueqiong Weng, Ligang Zhang, Peiran Feng
Human exposure to PAHs originates from a wide range of sources. Our study found negative trends between mixed PAHs exposure and IRT, DRT, and DSST scores, suggesting that exposure to multiple PAHs is a risk factor for cognition in older adults.
